data.title: How old is Robbie Williams?
data.meta_description: How old is Robbie Williams? Learn the birthday of Robbie Williams and the exact age in years, months and days, with additional information of the singer.
data.text: Robbie Williams is a popular American musician, songwriter, and singer, who became famous as a part of Take That pop group. Williams was born in 1974 in Staffordshire and has been showing his great talent and interest in music since he was a child. He took part in various school performances including the famous musical Oliver!. When he was only 16 years old Robbie joined Take That and spent amazing 6 years with the band, contributing to the band's performance with his vocals and songwriting. After leaving the band in the mid-1990s, he started his amazing solo career and has recorded 11 studio albums so far, most of which reached No 1 in British charts. He is one of the best selling British singers who sold over 75 million records in his career. Robbie Williams is a winner of a large number of British and international awards. He is especially honored and loved in his hometown where there are a street and a few attractions named after him. He is a huge football fan and the father of three.
